attributes.action: Keep BTEC Performing Arts as an available post-16 option in education
attributes.additional_details: Engagement in subjects such as Drama and Performing Arts is crucial for development in Oracy. This is an important current topic that has been evidenced in the Oracy All-Party Parliamentary Group interim report of December 2020.
attributes.background: Abstain from removing Drama and Performing Arts even further from The National Curriculum for England.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570179
